document_data.name: Saddlers' & Harness-makers' Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Saddlers' & Harness-Makers Hall''', also known simply as the '''Saddlers' Hall''', was the headquarters of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] of the [[Saddlers' and Harness-makers' Guild|same name]].
document_data.Location: This guildhall was located on [[Tulmaster's Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Services: Tack such [[bit and bridle|bits, bridles]] and [[saddle]]s could be purchased here.
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls in the Southern Ward, this building was used as a landmark by locals.
